item.title: Nelliejane add a quote by John Steinbeck
Nelliejane add a quote by Gandhi
item.description: "There is no school equal to a decent home and no teacher equal to a virtuous parent." -- Gandhi

item.title: Nelliejane add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Nelliejane add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Education: the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty." -- Mark Twain
